title: The Hypnotist's Daughter
description: In the movie industry, you don’t get something for nothing. The beauty and splendor of a Hollywood lifestyle can’t hide the ugly that evil leaves behind. Prosperity Baxter has been hypnotized to forget her past. When scenes from her lead role in a horror film dredge up those memories, secrets begin to surface. Lies, cover-ups and an unthinkable initiation all leave Peri desperate for one revenge.
author: Brittany Raschdorf
